overview: Don’t miss any of the action, strategy, and skill from the world’s best League of Legends players as the excitement of the World Final is broadcast live from the Chase Center in San Francisco, CA.  This cinema viewing party experience lets gamers come together with other players, receive commemorative thunder sticks (while supplies last), special Worlds 22 Game Capsule (from participating theatres), and an unprecedented Opening Ceremony performance by Grammy-award winning artist Lil Nas X.
tagline: 2022 LEAGUE OF LEGENDS WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP FINAL, comes to cinemas LIVE on Saturday, November 5 in a spectacular One Night Only™ event.
title: 2022 League of Legends World Championship
